resources.string: When this feature is enabled, your device will be automatically unlocked.Attention, this function can not work on all devices, and also in cases when you use a password, etc.
This parameter adjusts the sensitivity of your device to wake-ups. The recommended value is 8. It is not recommended to change this parameter. Spontaneous awakening of the device is possible.
Что бы изменения вступили в силу, необходимо перезапустить преложение.
